language.entry: The Seer's equipment is infused by the moon's light. She is able to speak to the dead and control her own spirit. She can kill, weaken, heal wounds, empower and calm the spirit of her companions. She might be blind but she still sees more than we can.
A group only needs one seer.

Unstable but usually reliable, the Seer is a dark moon priest that uses her own spirit to amplify her power. As a user of moon magic, she is unable to cause critical damage, however she can multicast her spells and some of them are so powerful that she can end up stunning herself, if she doesn't increase her resilience with her other spells.
Sometimes I feel bad for her, talking to the dead and all.
I have seen our future, everything will be alright.
Do not worry, we will survive.
Get up and fight, nothing can stop you as long as I'm here.
The moon shall keep you safe.
Spirits of our ancestors, protect me!
I got you in my sight!
Something is creeping up on us.
I cannot take much more of this.
I should unleash all of my power!
I will make sure we all survive!
The future is supposed to be mine.
I'm not waiting to die here.
You want to kill me? Go ahead!
I will make things easier for them.
I cannot die, I know how this ends.
The moon protects me, there is no way they can harm me.
I've seen the future and they are not in it!
If I stay here, this won't end well.
I need some time to focus.
We should stop all this fighting.
I should let them end us.
I need some time to think.
We are not supposed to fight here.
I'm not supposed to participate in this fight.
I've seen this, that is not a good idea.
I shouldnt, it might affect our future.
No, this is supposed to happen!
I will do what I need to!
I know what I'm supposed to do.
I've seen this before, this is what needs to happen!
No, I will do what I have to!
That is not what needs to happen!
I can't, I have to do this instead.
We are not supposed to fight...
I refuse, my will is the will of the future.
This is good, I'm supposed to be afraid.
I'm not supposed to be afraid.
I cannot wait for our next battle.
Why is this taking so long?
All of you need to focus, we are not supposed to be here.
Without my magic you all wouldn't be able to fight.
I'm not supposed to keep us safe!
I've seen what happens, it's not pretty.
This venture will not end well.
I've spoke to the celestials, they will not help us.
Our future journey will not be easy.
Hurt me more, if you dare.
I've never felt so alive before!
Maybe he is right, maybe I should embrace the darkness.
My spirit will save us all!
That was not supposed to happen.
How did I not see that coming?
Why havent I been warned about this?
We are not supposed to retreat.
We are supposed to perish here.
Celestials do not allow us to leave.
We are about to be surrounded.
They are coming for us all.
The moon will protect us from this evil!
They are going to ambush us.
I know what is about to happen!
No! You are not supposed to attack!
They are about to end us.
Dodging is good for you, you should try it.
All of this is very suspicious.
How did I not see that?!
This is not supposed to happen.
They are about to ambush us.
Don't stop, stay on the move.
That is not supposed to happen.
I refuse, that doesn't happen in our future.
That is not supposed to happen.
The celestials do not allow it.
That is not the way of us seers.
I never did that, so I shouldn't.
They are waiting for it, so no.
They will retaliate, not a good idea.
Do I look like I need healing?
My spirit does not like that.
Our end is near, no need to heal.
The moon will heal me, I do not need that.
In the future I didn't heal so I don't need that.
This shouldnt happen, so it won't.
Is that really what needs to happen?
Only the moon is allowed to do that.
Ethereal magic is the only magic I need.
I will not fall to the darkness...
Celestials bless me in this dark hour.
As it was foreseen, the end is near...
We are not supposed to be here.
If we do not leave, we perish.
I can feel the presence of something...
I cannot wait until our next battle.
I hope we continue our journey shortly.
There must always be a witch queen.
I can hear the souls whisper.
Our journey will not end well.
We need to let it go, the celestial magic will save us.
I hope we don't get ambushed here.
Pain is the only thing that I crave right now.
Why are you all so weak?
Where are the celestials now when I need them.
Maybe starving was the way to go...
I don't think this food will give me strength.
This didn't happen the first time around.

The Seer's equipment is infused by the moon's light. She is able to speak to the dead and control her own spirit. She can kill, weaken, heal wounds, empower and calm the spirit of her companions. She might be blind but she still sees more than we can.

I refuse, that doesn't happen in our future.

Only the moon is allowed to do that.

I will not fall to the darkness...

I hope we continue our journey shortly.

Where are the celestials now when I need them.
Maybe starving was the way to go...
I don't think this food will give me strength.
This didn't happen the first time around.
그녀는 죽은 자와 대화하며, 자신의 혼령을 자유자재로 다룹니다. 그녀는 적들을 죽이고 약화시키며, 상처를 치유하고 힘을 부여합니다. 또한 동료들의 영혼을 달랠 수 있습니다. 비록 눈이 멀어버렸지만, 선견자는 우리들의 세계 너머의 것들을 볼 수 있습니다.
불안정하면서도 강력한 선견자의 힘은 그녀의 영혼을 통해 강화됩니다. 암월의 사제인 선견자는 달의 마법을 사용하기 때문에 치명적인 피해를 입히지는 못합니다. 그녀는 여러 주문을 한번에 사용할 수 있지만, 너무 강력한 힘에 노출되면 기절해 버릴지도 모릅니다. 그러니 다른 주문을 이용해 회복력을 길러두십시오.
죽은 자의 혼령과 대화를 한다니, 가끔은 나까지 소름이 끼친다고.
제가 본 미래에선 우리 모두 안전합니다.
제가 있는 한 누구도 당신을 막을 수 없습니다.
달이 저를 지키니, 저들은 제게 상처입힐 수 없습니다.
저는 이 싸움에 참여할 운명이 아닙니다.
제가 본 바에 따르면, 좋은 미래가 아닙니다.
저는 곧 미래, 누구의 명령도 따르지 않습니다.
제 힘이 아니었다면 여러분은 싸울 수조차 없었을 것입니다.
별들은 더 이상 우릴 지켜주지 않을 것입니다.
정녕 제가 어둠의 힘을 받아들여야만 합니까?
운명은 피할 수 있는 것이 아닙니다.
이것은 우리 선견자들이 가서는 안될 길입니다.
달라질 것 없으니 힘 빼지 마십시오.
달이 당신 대신 치유해 줄 것입니다.
미래의 제가 치유받지 않았으니, 저도 치유받지 않겠습니다.
일어나야 하지 말아야 할 일은 일으키지 마십시오.
오직 달만이 할 수 있는 일입니다.
흘러가는 대로 두면, 별들이 우리를 지켜줄 것입니다.
어느 쪽이든 죽기 딱 좋아 보입니다.
별들이여, 제 간곡한 부름에 왜 답하지 않으십니까?
굶는 것이 올바른 미래였을 지도 모릅니다...
이 음식은 별로 도움이 될 것 같지 않습니다.
저번 세상에서는 이런 일이 없었는데 말입니다.

A group only needs one seer.

Unstable but usually reliable, the Seer is a dark moon priest that uses her own spirit to amplify her power. As a user of moon magic, she is unable to cause critical damage, however she can multicast her spells and some of them are so powerful that she can end up stunning herself, if she doesn't increase her resilience with her other spells.
Sometimes I feel bad for her, talking to the dead and all.
I have seen our future, everything will be alright.
Do not worry, we will survive.
Get up and fight, nothing can stop you as long as I'm here.
The moon shall keep you safe.
Spirits of our ancestors, protect me!
I got you in my sight!
Something is creeping up on us.
I cannot take much more of this.
I should unleash all of my power!
I will make sure we all survive!
The future is supposed to be mine.
I'm not waiting to die here.
You want to kill me? Go ahead!
I will make things easier for them.
I cannot die, I know how this ends.
The moon protects me, there is no way they can harm me.
I've seen the future and they are not in it!
If I stay here, this won't end well.
I need some time to focus.
We should stop all this fighting.
I should let them end us.
I need some time to think.
We are not supposed to fight here.
I'm not supposed to participate in this fight.
I've seen this, that is not a good idea.
I shouldnt, it might affect our future.
No, this is supposed to happen!
I will do what I need to!
I know what I'm supposed to do.
I've seen this before, this is what needs to happen!
No, I will do what I have to!
That is not what needs to happen!
I can't, I have to do this instead.
We are not supposed to fight...
I refuse, my will is the will of the future.
This is good, I'm supposed to be afraid.
I'm not supposed to be afraid.
I cannot wait for our next battle.
Why is this taking so long?
All of you need to focus, we are not supposed to be here.
Without my magic you all wouldn't be able to fight.
I'm not supposed to keep us safe!
I've seen what happens, it's not pretty.
This venture will not end well.
I've spoke to the celestials, they will not help us.
Our future journey will not be easy.
Hurt me more, if you dare.
I've never felt so alive before!
Maybe he is right, maybe I should embrace the darkness.
My spirit will save us all!
That was not supposed to happen.
How did I not see that coming?
Why havent I been warned about this?
We are not supposed to retreat.
We are supposed to perish here.
Celestials do not allow us to leave.
We are about to be surrounded.
They are coming for us all.
The moon will protect us from this evil!
They are going to ambush us.
I know what is about to happen!
No! You are not supposed to attack!
They are about to end us.
Dodging is good for you, you should try it.
All of this is very suspicious.
How did I not see that?!
This is not supposed to happen.
They are about to ambush us.
Don't stop, stay on the move.
That is not supposed to happen.
I refuse, that doesn't happen in our future.
That is not supposed to happen.
The celestials do not allow it.
That is not the way of us seers.
I never did that, so I shouldn't.
They are waiting for it, so no.
They will retaliate, not a good idea.
Do I look like I need healing?
My spirit does not like that.
Our end is near, no need to heal.
The moon will heal me, I do not need that.
In the future I didn't heal so I don't need that.
This shouldnt happen, so it won't.
Is that really what needs to happen?
Only the moon is allowed to do that.
Ethereal magic is the only magic I need.
I will not fall to the darkness...
Celestials bless me in this dark hour.
As it was foreseen, the end is near...
We are not supposed to be here.
If we do not leave, we perish.
I can feel the presence of something...
I cannot wait until our next battle.
I hope we continue our journey shortly.
There must always be a witch queen.
I can hear the souls whisper.
Our journey will not end well.
We need to let it go, the celestial magic will save us.
I hope we don't get ambushed here.
Pain is the only thing that I crave right now.
Why are you all so weak?
Where are the celestials now when I need them.
Maybe starving was the way to go...
I don't think this food will give me strength.
This didn't happen the first time around.

The Seer's equipment is infused by the moon's light. She is able to speak to the dead and control her own spirit. She can kill, weaken, heal wounds, empower and calm the spirit of her companions. She might be blind but she still sees more than we can.
A group only needs one seer.

Unstable but usually reliable, the Seer is a dark moon priest that uses her own spirit to amplify her power. As a user of moon magic, she is unable to cause critical damage, however she can multicast her spells and some of them are so powerful that she can end up stunning herself, if she doesn't increase her resilience with her other spells.
Sometimes I feel bad for her, talking to the dead and all.

I hope we continue our journey shortly.

Why are you all so weak?
Where are the celestials now when I need them.
Maybe starving was the way to go...
I don't think this food will give me strength.
This didn't happen the first time around.

El equipamiento de la vidente es infundido por la luz de la luna. Ella es capaz de hablar con los muertos y controlar su propio espíritu. Ella puede matar, debilitar, curar heridas, potenciar y calmar el espíritu de sus compañeros. Ella puede ser ciega, pero aún así puede ver cosas que los demas no.
El grupo sólo necesita una vidente.

Inestable pero generalmente confiable, la vidente es una sacerdotisa de luna oscura que utiliza su propio espíritu para amplificar su poder. Como un usuario de la magia de la luna, ella es incapaz de causar daño crítico, sin embargo ella puede multidifundir sus hechizos y algunos de ellos son tan poderosos que ella puede acabar sorprendiéndose, si no aumenta su resistencia con sus otros hechizos.
A veces me siento mal por ella, hablando con los muertos y todo.
Te da una herencia al azar
Tu deseo es una orden para mí.
He visto nuestro futuro, todo va a estar bien.
Levántate y lucha, nada puede detenerte mientras yo esté aquí.
La luna te mantendrá a salvo.
Yo se lo que esta pasando.
No puedo tomar mucho más de esto.
Se supone que el futuro es mío.
No estoy esperando a morir aquí.
Haré las cosas más fáciles para ellos.
No puedo morir, sé cómo termina esto.
La luna me protege, no hay forma de que me puedan hacer daño.
¡He visto el futuro y no estáis en él!
Si me quedo aquí, esto no terminará bien.
Debería dejar que acabaran con nosotros.
La muerte no es tan mala.
No estoy obligada a participar en esto.
Ya lo he visto antes, no es una buena idea.
No debería, podría afectar nuestro futuro.
Sé lo que se supone que tengo que hacer.
¡He visto esto antes, esto es lo que tiene que suceder!
¡No, voy a hacer lo que tengo que hacer!
¡Eso no es lo que tiene que suceder!
No puedo, tengo que hacer esto en su lugar.
Eso no es lo que hice...
Me niego, mi voluntad es la voluntad del futuro.
Esto es bueno, se supone que tengo miedo.
Se supone que no tengo miedo.
No puedo esperar para nuestra próxima batalla.
Todos ustedes necesitan enfocarse, no se supone que estamos aquí.
Sin mi magia no todos serían capaces de luchar.
¡No debo que debemos manteneros a salvo.!
He visto lo que pasa, no es bonito.
He hablado con los celestiales, no nos ayudarán.
Nuestro futuro viaje no será fácil.
Vuelve a tocarme, si te atreves.
Nunca me he sentido tan viva antes!
Tal vez tiene razón, tal vez debería abrazar la oscuridad.
¿Por qué no me han avisado sobre esto?
No podemos escapar de nuestro destino.
Se supone que debemos perecer aquí.
Los celestiales no nos permiten irnos.
Estamos a punto de ser rodeados.
¡Sé lo que está a punto de pasar!
¡No! ¡Se suponía que no tenías que atacar!
¡O empezamos a pelear, o nos retiramos ya!
Es el futuro el que tiene nuestra muerte.
Están a punto de acabar con nosotros.
¡Báñate en la luz de la Luna!
Eso no es lo que se supone que pasará.
Están a punto de hacernos una emboscada.
Eso no es lo que se supone que pasará.
Me niego. No es eso lo que pasa en nuestro futuro.
Eso no es lo que se supone que pasará.
Ese no es el camino que he.
Nunca hice esto, así que no debería.
Es lo que esperan, así que no.
Contraatacarán. No es una buena idea.
A mi espíritu eso no le gusta.
El final se acerca, no necesitamos sanar.
La Luna me curará, así que no necesito eso.
En el futuro no he sanado así que no necesito eso.
Esto no debería suceder, así que no lo hará.
¿Realmente es eso lo que tiene que suceder?
Sólo a la Luna se le permite hacer eso.
La magia etérea es la única magia que necesito.
Los celestiales me bendicen en esta hora tan oscura.
Abraza la luz de la luna.
Como estaba previsto, el fin está cerca...
No puedo esperar a nuestra siguiente pelea.
Espero que prosigamos nuestro viaje en breve.
Siempre debe haber una reina bruja.
Esto está poniendo a prueba mi paciencia.
Debemos dejarlo estar. La magia celestial nos salvará.
Espero que no nos embosquen aquí.
El dolor es lo único que anhelo ahora mismo.
Dónde están los celestiales cuando se les necesita.
Quizás el hambre es una buena opción...
No creo que esto vaya a darme fuerzas.
Esto no ocurrió la primera vez.

Broń Wyroczni zaklęta jest magią księżyca. Potrafi ona rozmawiać z umarłymi I kontrolować własnego ducha, jak również zabijać, osłabiać, leczyć lub wzmacniać innych zaklinając ich dusze. Nie daj zwieść się jej ślepocie, ona widzi więcej niż ktokolwiek.

Niestabilna lecz skuteczna, Wyrocznia jest kapłanką księżyca która zaklina własną duszę by zwiększyć swą moc. Mistyczna aura księżyca nie pozwala jej zadawać obrażeń krytycznych, ale sprawia, że jej zaklęcia mają szanse ulec zwielokrotnieniu, choć część z nich jest tak potężna że mogą ją ogłuszyć jeżeli uprzednio się nie przygotuje.
Czasami współczuję jej tego, że słyszy co mówią umarli.
Widziałam naszą przyszłość, wszystko będzie dobrze.
Wstawaj I walcz, nic cię nie powstrzyma dopuki masz mnie u swego boku.
A więc tak to się zakończy.
Ten ból jest nie do zniesienia!
Przecież przyszłość miała należec do mnie.
Trzymajcie ich z dala ode mnie!
Nie będę tu stać aż mnie zabiją.
Jak chcesz mnie zabić to dawaj!
Nie mogę umrzec, wiem że przeżyję.
Księżyc mnie chroni, nie będą w stanie mnie zranić.
Widziałam przyszłość, w której ich nie ma!
Jeżeli tu zostanę, to nie skończy się dobrze.
Nie powinnam brać udziału w tej walce.
Wiem co planujesz I to nie jest dobry pomysł.
Na prawdę nie powinnam tego robić.
Nie, to się nie miało wydarzyć!
Byłam tu już, to musi się wydarzyć!
Nie, będzę robić to co muszę!
To nie to powinno się stać!
W ogóle nie powinniśmy teraz walczyć...
Odmawiam, ma wola jest naszą przyszłością.
To nie może być nic dobrego.
Nie mogę doczekać się kolejnej bitwy.
Skupcie się wszyscy, nie powinniśmy tu w ogóle być.
Bez mej magii nie bylibyście w stanie dalej walczyć.
Wiem co nas czeka, nic przyjemnego.
Ta wyprawa nie skończy się dobrze.
Nasza droga w krótce dobiegnie końca.
Rozmawiałam z duchami, odwróciły się od nas.
Zrańcie mnie bardziej, jeśli się ośmielicie!
Nigdy nie czułam się tak żywa!
A jeśli ma rację, może powinnam zaakceptować mrok.
Dlaczego nie zostałam przed tym ostrzeżona?
Księżyc uchroni nas przed tym złem!
Trzymajcie się z dala ode mnie!
Zacznij walczyć albo bierz nogi za pas!
Unikanie ataków dobrze by ci zrobiło, wiesz?
Nie zgadzam się tego nie ma w naszej przyszłości.
Po co w ogóle się staramy?
Duchy nie wyrażają na to zgody.
Nigdy tego nie zrobiłam, nie powinnam...
Czy ja wyglądam jakbym potrzebowała pomocy??
Nasz koniec jest bliski, nie ma sensu się leczyć.
Księżyc mnie uzdrowi, nie potrzebuję tego.
To nie powinno się stać, więc się nie stanie.
Czy to aby na pewno powinno się wydarzyć?
Nie możesz mnie po prostu zignorować?
Magia eteru to wszystko czego potrzebuję.
Tak jak to było przewidziane, koniec jest blisko...
Jeśli nie odejdziemy to po nas.
Obyśmy ruszyli w drogę jak najszybciej.
Gwiazy nas ocalą, jeśli tylko przestaniemy walczyć.
Gdzie są duchy kiedy ich potrzebuję.
Nic nie da mi siły, nawet posiłek.

This didn't happen the first time around.

Снаряжение смотрящей переливается лунным светом. Она способна общаться с мертвыми и подчинять себе свой дух. Она может убивать, ослаблять, исцелять, усиливать и сохранять дух товарищей. Хоть она и выглядит, как слепая, но ей дано видеть гораздо больше, чем нам.
Нам не нужна ещё одна Смотрящая.

Нестабильная, но, обычно, надёжная, Смотрящая - жрец лунного света, использующая собственный дух для увеличения своей силы. Как адепт духовной магии, она не в состоянии нанести критический урон, однако, она может приумножить свои заклинания, некоторые из которых столь могущественны, что оглушают её саму, если перед этим она не повысит свою сопротивляемость.
Иногда мне не по себе от этой её болтовни с мертвецами и прочего.
Я видела наше будущее, всё будет в порядке.
Встать и сражаться, ничто нас не остановит, покуда я здесь.
Я должна показать всю свою мощь!
Я буду уверена, что мы все выживем!
Я не стану ждать здесь смерти.
Я не могу умереть, я знаю, что будет в конце.
Луна хранит меня, у них нет возможности мне навредить.
Я видела будущее и их там нет!
если я останусь здесь, добром это не кончится.
Мне нужно немного времени на размышления.
Я не должна учавствовать в этой битве.
Я не должна, это может повлиять на наше будущее.
Я буду делать то, что сочту нужным!
Я уже это видела, так нужно!
Нет, я сделаю то, что должна!
Это не то, чему нужно случиться!
Я не могу, лучше сделаю так.
Это не то, что я сделала...
Я отказываюсь, моя воля - воля будущего.
Вам всем нужно сосредоточиться, мы не должны быть здесь.
Без моей магии вы не сможете сражаться.
Я видела, что случилось, это некрасиво.
Я говорила с небесами, они нам не помогут.
Наше будущее приключение не будет простым.
Никогда не чувствовала себя такой живой!
Может, он прав, может, я должна принять тьму.
Почему меня об этом не предупредили?
Тебе бы не помешало уворачиваться, попробуй как-нибудь.
Мы не должны идти этим путём.
Я отказываюсь, этого нет в нашем будущем.
Это не тот путь, что нам предначертан.
Я не сделаю этого, потому что не должна.
Они этого ждут, так что нет.
Выглядит, как будто мне нужно лечение?
Моему духу это не по нраву.
Не нужно лечения, наш конец близок.
TМне это не нужно, Луна исцелит меня.
В будущем я не исцелилась, значит мне это не нужно.
Это не должно произойти, значит не нужно.
Это то, что действительно должно случиться?
Эфирная магия - единственная, что мне нужна.
Небеса хранят меня в сей тёмный час.
Мы должны идти, небесная магия защитит нас.
Надеюсь, мы не попадём здесь в засаду.
Где сейчас небеса, когда они столь мне нужны.
Не думаю, что это придаст мне сил.
В первый раз такого не было.

The Seer's equipment is infused by the moon's light. She is able to speak to the dead and control her own spirit. She can kill, weaken, heal wounds, empower and calm the spirit of her companions. She might be blind but she still sees more than we can.
A group only needs one seer.

Unstable but usually reliable, the Seer is a dark moon priest that uses her own spirit to amplify her power. As a user of moon magic, she is unable to cause critical damage, however she can multicast her spells and some of them are so powerful that she can end up stunning herself, if she doesn't increase her resilience with her other spells.
Sometimes I feel bad for her, talking to the dead and all.
I have seen our future, everything will be alright.
Do not worry, we will survive.
Get up and fight, nothing can stop you as long as I'm here.
The moon shall keep you safe.
Spirits of our ancestors, protect me!
I got you in my sight!
Something is creeping up on us.
I cannot take much more of this.
I should unleash all of my power!
I will make sure we all survive!
The future is supposed to be mine.
I'm not waiting to die here.
You want to kill me? Go ahead!
I will make things easier for them.
I cannot die, I know how this ends.
The moon protects me, there is no way they can harm me.
I've seen the future and they are not in it!
If I stay here, this won't end well.
I need some time to focus.
We should stop all this fighting.
I should let them end us.
I need some time to think.
We are not supposed to fight here.
I'm not supposed to participate in this fight.
I've seen this, that is not a good idea.
I shouldnt, it might affect our future.
No, this is supposed to happen!
I will do what I need to!
I know what I'm supposed to do.
I've seen this before, this is what needs to happen!
No, I will do what I have to!
That is not what needs to happen!
I can't, I have to do this instead.
We are not supposed to fight...
I refuse, my will is the will of the future.
This is good, I'm supposed to be afraid.
I'm not supposed to be afraid.
I cannot wait for our next battle.
Why is this taking so long?
All of you need to focus, we are not supposed to be here.
Without my magic you all wouldn't be able to fight.
I'm not supposed to keep us safe!
I've seen what happens, it's not pretty.
This venture will not end well.
I've spoke to the celestials, they will not help us.
Our future journey will not be easy.
Hurt me more, if you dare.
I've never felt so alive before!
Maybe he is right, maybe I should embrace the darkness.
My spirit will save us all!
That was not supposed to happen.
How did I not see that coming?
Why havent I been warned about this?
We are not supposed to retreat.
We are supposed to perish here.
Celestials do not allow us to leave.
We are about to be surrounded.
They are coming for us all.
The moon will protect us from this evil!
They are going to ambush us.
I know what is about to happen!
No! You are not supposed to attack!
They are about to end us.
Dodging is good for you, you should try it.
All of this is very suspicious.
How did I not see that?!
This is not supposed to happen.
They are about to ambush us.
Don't stop, stay on the move.
That is not supposed to happen.
I refuse, that doesn't happen in our future.
That is not supposed to happen.
The celestials do not allow it.
That is not the way of us seers.
I never did that, so I shouldn't.
They are waiting for it, so no.
They will retaliate, not a good idea.
Do I look like I need healing?
My spirit does not like that.
Our end is near, no need to heal.
The moon will heal me, I do not need that.
In the future I didn't heal so I don't need that.
This shouldnt happen, so it won't.
Is that really what needs to happen?
Only the moon is allowed to do that.
Ethereal magic is the only magic I need.
I will not fall to the darkness...
Celestials bless me in this dark hour.
As it was foreseen, the end is near...
We are not supposed to be here.
If we do not leave, we perish.
I can feel the presence of something...
I cannot wait until our next battle.
I hope we continue our journey shortly.
There must always be a witch queen.
I can hear the souls whisper.
Our journey will not end well.
We need to let it go, the celestial magic will save us.
I hope we don't get ambushed here.
Pain is the only thing that I crave right now.
Why are you all so weak?
Where are the celestials now when I need them.
Maybe starving was the way to go...
I don't think this food will give me strength.
This didn't happen the first time around.
